Subsection.Text: Only a public officer or a public employee upon whom the public officer has delegated authority shall, consistent with law, take actions, including, but not limited to:

Paragraph.Text: Approving position descriptions, performance standards, or salary adjustments for state employees; and
Hiring, promoting, disciplining, demoting, and dismissing a state employee.

Subsection.Text: Only a public officer shall, consistent with law, commission and appoint state officers.
